actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to enlarge the Sequoia National Park in the State of California.

summary.text: Provides for the inclusion of the Sequoia National Game Refuge within the the Sequoia National Park. Provides that the owner or lessee of residential property acquired under this Act may retain a right of use and occupancy of the property for non-commercial residential purpose, ending either 1) at the death of owner or spouse or 2) not more than 25 years from the date of acquisition. (Repeals 16 U.S.C. 45a-3, 688, 68ga-c)

titles.title: A bill to enlarge the Sequoia National Park in the State of California.
